tanyao.name: Tanyao
tanyao.description: Only the tiles 2 through 8 (no 1s, 9s, or honors)
sanshokudoujun.name: Sanshoku Doujun
sanshokudoujun.description: The same sequence in each suit
iipeikou.name: Iipeikou
iipeikou.description: Two of the exact same sequence
pinfu.name: Pinfu
pinfu.description: A hand worth 0 fu. All sequences, with a non-Yakuhai pair and a two sided open wait (23, not 12, 13, or 1234, eg.)
riichi.name: Riichi
riichi.description: 1000 point bet. Cannot change hand, discard draws unless you win
ittsu.name: Ittsu
ittsu.description: The sequences 123, 456, and 789 in a suit
daisangen.name: Daisangen
daisangen.description: A set of each of the three dragons
